name: Toxea
description:
Toxea aka Toxic Tea
You're a sweet a girl that needs to find out which leaf is safe before the Tea Time!
One out of 3 leafs is safe, but which one? Maybe you will find out when looking around the room, but don't take too long, the clock is ticking.

It's a game made in 3 hours for trijam game jam.

Controlls:
Arrows to move
E to interact and stop interacting

Special thanks to Imie, for giving me some awesome music tracks I can use in games.
And of course you :3
For playing, rating, or just looking by. Stay hydrated!
